isis.stitle: ALTERNATOR: DELCO-REMY 20-SI SERIES, TYPE 300 (BRUSHLESS) - REPAIR PROCEDURES - RECTIFIER BRIDGE CHECK (Omit for Overcharged Battery)

svcproc.title: RECTIFIER BRIDGE CHECK (Omit for Overcharged Battery)
svcproc.para: To check the rectifier bridge, connect the ohmmeter to a heat sink and one of the three terminals (Step 1, Figure 8. Then reverse the lead connections to the same heat sink and if both readings are the same, replace the rectifier bridge by detaching the necessary screws and nuts. A good rectifier bridge will give one high and one low reading. Repeat this same test between the same heat sink and the other two terminals, and between the other heat sink and each of the three terminals. This makes a total of six checks, with two readings taken for each check.

figure.caption: Checking Components With Ohmmeter (Diode Trio Removed)

important.para: If rectifier bridge is constructed with flat metal clips at the three studs, press down firmly onto flat metal clips and not onto threaded stud.
